snippet: In “Lost Persons Area,” an engineer’s arrival changes life for a Belgian family.
abstract: Nicholas Rapold reviews movie Lost Persons Area, directed by Caroline Strubbe.
lead_paragraph: In “Lost Persons Area,” an engineer’s arrival changes life for a Belgian family.

headline.print_headline: An Ordinary Setting, Thick With Family Dynamics
